landing.bio: I am an undergraduate student at IIITDM Kurnool doing major in Computer Science and Engineering. I am passionate about contributing to developer community and is associated with many community developer programs. I am an opensource contributor and have contributed to many projects. My tech stack includes Python and Javascript, Java, C, C++. Python for Machine Learning Projects. I use Express.js framework for the server side development and React for the frontend development. I have created Android Apps in Android studio for which I have been offered an internship at INIESTA Webtech solution. I am a member of Codigo club in my college and have contributed projects under that club.
landing.lifePhilosophy: I shall either find a way or make one

experience.aboutWork: Developing new Android Apps under my mentor and submitting them to Google Play Store. Deigning UI and server side development by integrating Apis' to those Apps'.

experience.position: Smart Voice Assistant Android App Intern
experience.aboutWork: Working under Phani Bhushan to create a Voice Assistant Android Application which is intelligent to perform engaging conversations with customers and make their lives simple.

education.university: Indian Institute of Information Technology, Design and Manufacturing, Kurnool

interests.para1: Apart from being a programmer, I enjoy most of the time watchin YouTube videos about great advancements in Technology. I do follow Elon Musk as he is the inspiration behind my hard work. I am fascinated by Elon Musk's Falcon Rockets, Tesla cars and Hyper loop.
interests.para2: I enjoy participating in technical competitions in my college where I will gain knowledge of my position in this competitive world. I have participated in Robo Race in April 2019 and I have come to know many crucial things such as winning this race depends more on driver controlling compared to Robo body building.

awards.awardDetail: Google at IIITDM (Predict whether Ronaldo would hit a goal or not at a given situation using Machine learning.)
